means: 布干达（乌干达中南部一地区）

PerfectNetExp.abs: bugaboo 巫师, buganda 布干达, bugallo 布加略

means.word_mean: 1. a state of Uganda and site of a former Bantu kingdom

auth_sentence.content: Buganda begins to expand at the expense of Bunyoro.
auth_sentence.res_content: Buganda begins to expand at the expense of Bunyoro.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Buganda begins to expand at the expense of Bunyoro.

auth_sentence.content: Uganda becomes a republic with Buganda's King Mutesa as president.
auth_sentence.res_content: Uganda becomes a republic with Buganda's King Mutesa as president.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Uganda becomes a republic with Buganda's King Mutesa as president.

auth_sentence.content: Milton Obote ends Buganda's autonomy and promotes himself to the presidency.
auth_sentence.res_content: Milton Obote ends Buganda's autonomy and promotes himself to the presidency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Milton Obote ends Buganda's autonomy and promotes himself to the presidency.
